## Prerequisites

Where required, I've:

- [ ] Validated this repo's version number in:
    - [ ] This PR's title
    - [ ] Appdata.xml
    - [ ] meson.build
- [ ] Validated dependency version numbers in:
    - [ ] meson.build
    - [ ] README.md
    - [ ] the `deb-packaging` branch
- [ ] Validated screenshots
- [ ] Validated new appdata changelog data
- [ ] Updated the release data in appdata
